Second year Scholarship students and select first year students will have the opportunity to apprentice
with MOVE: the company, Drive Dance Centre's 2010/2011 Artist-in-residence.

 

Work Experience

 

Scholarship is proven to develop and establish successful, business savvy dance artists!

 

More Info

Dance Training

A variety of faculty and staff will rotate throughout the season and the dancers will have amazing opportunities to develop and grow in their craft!

More Info

Business Education

Scholarship focuses on building knowledge and growth in pre-professional dancers that are eager to work in the industry!

More Info

Auditions

If you are interested in joining this year's Scholarship program but have missed the audition, please Contact Us.

More Info

Artist in Residence

Drive Dance Centre and MOVE: the company will co-produce a performance event in Spring 2011, to share the results of the collaborations between the program's students and our company's next generation of creators.
